name: Licensing ruleset
description: The ruleset to use for SBI Licensing

rules.justification: We are stripping the Affix from the filenames.
I need to use more generic variable names for easing cloning to a PTE.
I use this to expose internals to Test app.  This warning is valid, but unhelpful.
While correct, this insights key will be injected during build pipelines from Secrets.  This warning encourages storing a private key IN source code, which in my case, is public. Not good.
